sentences.en: " Guinea hens ,'said Archie suddenly and his voice was contemptuous.
sentences.cn: " 你们这帮蠢货?"阿尔奇突然用轻蔑的语气说.

sentences.en: About 85 species from Ceylon to South East Asia and New Guinea.
sentences.cn: 近85种﹐分布区域由锡兰至东南亚及新几内亚.

sentences.en: Being herbivores, guinea pigs eat almost constantly, and metabolize food very quickly.
sentences.cn: 作为食草动物, 猪猪几乎一直都在吃, 食物的新层代谢非常快.

sentences.en: General MacArthur attacked through New Guinea and into the Philippines.
sentences.cn: 麦克阿瑟将军通过新几内亚攻击和进入菲律宾.

sentences.en: General Macarthur was working westward along the north coast of New Guinea.
sentences.cn: 麦克阿瑟将军正在沿着新几内亚北岸向西进军.

sentences.en: H 2 SO 4 is at least 100 times as lethal as SO 2 in guinea pigs.
sentences.cn: 在豚鼠中,硫酸致死性至少为二氧化硫致死性的一百倍.

sentences.en: He dresses decently, yet he seldom has a guinea at command.
sentences.cn: 他衣着体面, 然而他很少有一块钱可供花用.

sentences.en: I'd catch hold of your throat and choke you for half a guinea. "
sentences.cn: 我拿半克朗打赌,一定要抓住你的喉咙掐死你. ”

sentences.en: Objective : To test the trichinella spiralis antibody from the infected guinea pigs.
sentences.cn: 目的探索检测旋毛虫病抗体的简便易行方法.

sentences.en: Papua New Guinea became independent from Australia in 1975.
sentences.cn: 巴布亚新几内亚1975年脱离澳大利亚正式独立。
1974年,葡萄牙承认 几内亚比绍.

sentences.en: South American cavy; possibly ancestral to the domestic guinea pig.
sentences.cn: 南美洲豚鼠; 可能是家养豚鼠的祖先.

sentences.en: Students in fifty schools are to act as guinea pigs for these new teaching methods.
sentences.cn: 五十所学校的学生将作为这些新教学法的试验对象。

sentences.en: They use prison as guinea pig to test drug.
sentences.cn: 他们用罪犯来试验药品.

sentences.en: We inject guinea pigs or rabbits with enkephalins that are chemically coupled to large proteins.
sentences.cn: 我们将脑素和大分子蛋白质从化学上结合起来,把它注射给豚鼠或兔.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 赤道几内亚（西非国家）
新几内亚（澳大利亚北方岛屿）

trans.tran_cn: 畿尼（英国的旧金币，值一镑一先令），几内亚，[俚语] 意大利人：用作贬义词，指意大利人或意大利后裔
trans.tran_en: a British gold coin or unit of money used in the past, worth one pound and one  shilling  (£1.05). Prices are sometimes still given in guineas when buying or selling  racehorses .
